channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-19298] Fix operator tree of CTAS for Druid Storage Handler
item.description: Current operator plan of CTAS for Druid storage handler is broken when used enables the property {code} hive.exec.parallel{code} as {code} true{code}
item.summary: Fix operator tree of CTAS for Druid Storage Handler

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
ashutoshc / jcamachorodriguez can you please take a look.

I added an extra kind of visitor style path to append all the commit insert hooks to the tez task from concerning the same table.

-1 overall
